A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Over 40 year fan! I found this entertaining and really enjoyable! Some people are way too critical and sensitive! See it on the big screen! You’ll enjoy it! Seriously! Go see this movie. You'll enjoy it. I'm almost 50. I've seen them all. Too many sensitive and critical people review this and are driving the rating down. That's too bad. Wahhhhh. I think people forgot what a whimp Luke was in every single episode right up until the end. Always whining and needing to be pushed. Go back and watch. Give me a break. Leia was always stronger. This film is full of surprises. It had a lot more comedy than I would have expected\, but maybe the jokes just landed better than the cheesy jokes in the older films (sorry George). There's a ton of scenes that will put a nice heartwarming smile on your face and a bunch that will make you go WOW! I plan on seeing it again!
